name: Breakfast Casserole
instructions: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 9x13 casserole dish. In skillet, melt butter and cook onions and mushrooms until tender; allow to cool slightly. Place potatoes in large bowl. Combine eggs with milk, parsley, salt, garlic salt and pepper. Pour over potatoes. Add onions, mushrooms and grated cheese. Mix and pour into casserole dish. Top with more cheese, if desired. Can be covered and refrigerated overnight. Bake 1+ hours until set.

name: Seven Layer Dip
instructions: Debone chicken and chop. Mix marinade according to package directions. Combine chicken with 1‚ÅÑ2 of marinade and black beans. Spread in bottom of pan or plate. Layer sour cream, guacamole dip, cheese, tomatoes, olives and green chilies. Serve with tortilla chips.

name: Crockpot Chicken
instructions: put 1/2 the chicken in crockpot, cover with 1/2 the soup. sprinkle 1/2 of the italian dressing on top. repeat with the rest of the chicken, soup and dressing. cube cream cheese and sprinkle on top. cook on low for 4-5 hours or high for 2-3 hours or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
